game.name: 卡牌模拟-魔物生活
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Card Simulation - Monster Life is a role - playing game in which you simulate the survival of slimes, the weakest monsters in a fantasy world, through cards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Card Simulation - Monster Life is a role - playing game in which you simulate the survival of slimes, the weakest monsters in a fantasy world, through cards.
